title: KFC Chicken
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon salt', '2 tablespoons pepper', '4 tablespoons paprika', '1 cup flour', '1 teaspoon garlic salt', '1 tablespoon ground mustard', '1 tablespoon ground French thyme', '1 teaspoon sweet basil', '1 teaspoon ground oregano', '1 tablespoon ground Jamaican ginger', '8 portions chicken (legs or wings, etc.)', '1 egg', 'oil for frying']
